metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Wall and near HAG SurvivorsNOTE please rename to Burzenberg being scanned by Steel Watcher

0.speaker: Burzenberg
0.text: That walking teapot will never walk again, or my name isn't Burzenberg.

1.speaker: Burzenberg
1.text: I stole an apple once when I was nine, but that thing won't know about it. I hope.
